title: How does ESR 78 update?
content:
Hello Guys,

How does the browser update on ESR channel? We currently use version 78. I've checked about:config and could not find "app.update.background.enabled"

We use this in an enterpise environment, meaning users can't update or install anything on their machines.

According to: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-esr-release-cycle

It updates via "the application update service". But what this service is, is not described.

Cheers,

Abdel
creator: a.yacoubi

title: When I open a new tab it automatically switches to it, and yes I turned that option OFF in settings.
content:
While using Firefox if I click to open anew tab it automatically goes to it, even thought I have that option turned OFF in my settings.

Anyone know how to fix this?
creator: Big_Red_8

title: Lentitud de carga páginas Google "esperando a fonts.googleapis.com"
content:
Hola, al actualizar a la versión 90, me dí cuenta que el navegador dejó de cargar las páginas de servicio de Google (Gmail, Youtube, etc).

Volví a la versión 89 y se solucionó, y estuve esperando a que sacasen actualizaciones para ver si se corregía el problema.

He instalado la versión 91, y parece que ya carga los servicios, pero me he dado cuenta de que hay determinadas páginas que se ralentiza el proceso y en la barra aparece este mensaje "esperando a fonts.googleapis.com"

Finalmente, carga las páginas, pero tras una demora de unos 20 o 30 segundos, y hay servicios como Google Street Maps, que directamente siguen sin funcionar bien.

¿Alguna idea de cómo solucionarlo?
creator: jesduce

title: www.bloomberght.com sitesinde bağlantı sorunu oluşuyor. Daha önce çökme habercisiyle kurtarıyordum. Şu anda hiçbir şekilde erişemiyorum.

title: lost all tabs after shutdown due to yahoo login misdirected page
content:
I was trying to change my password for yahoo and was repeatedly hitting a misdirected msg. I did a normal shutdown but when I rebooted all the pages came up with a single empty page.

I'm afraid to shut down now for fear of losing the prior session information. When I look for the json files I only see ones dated from April of 2021 or earlier. None of the recovery selections are showing in 3button history or the history tab. Not sure how to get back the most recent history and how to boot with it.

I have included the troublshooting info as images as I'm currently using chrome for this session. Thanks for any assistance you can give.

Mike
creator: docmaas1

title: Allow popups - multiple users / PCs
content: Hi, I was looking over the Internet a way to go through profile file inside FF to enable all popus on multiple user account / PCs with only one code line but i was not able to find it, I have already preconfigured some changes in those profile files and would like to add "allow all popups"

title: Trouble with weathernetwork.com
content:
Have always used the weathernetwork.com on firefox. This past week, the weather information does not fill in--eg temperatures are blank. The videos show up. The menu does not work. Is there somewhere that I need to check something or remove a check mark to get this to work again. The other browsers work but for part of a day they did not work either. Thanks for any help you can give.

Janet
creator: janet.wayne

title: Firefox Browser windows unable to use Dark Theme after MacOS Big Sur update to 11.5.2
content:
Hi.

After the recent update of MacOS Big Sur to 11.5.2, my Firefox browser cannot display web pages in dark mode. I've tried reinstalling Firefox, reinstalling MacOSX, used Time Machine, changed Mac display settings, changed Firefox settings and nothing works. I've attached a screenshot of how my monitor looks after the update. The background is always white If anybody has a suggestion of how to fix this or what is wrong, please let me know so others can benefit from it if they have the same problem.

Notice the white background behind the number 1,2,3,4.
creator: alnnewt

title: 'Sync settings' option omits the 'Search Shortcuts' configuration
content:
After syncing two of my Windows computers (10 & 11), I noticed that the Search Shortcuts configuration of the FF Dev browser on one computer (the more recently updated browser) did not sync to the other computer's FF Dev browser. Both computers show that settings/options should sync.

I suppose this is more of a bug report than a question, but if anyone has any advice, I would appreciate hearing it.
creator: polyversialmind

title: Loading Facebook
content: I and it appears many others are now not able to load Facebook properly with Firefox. Do you plan on fixing this problem?
creator: coolcar.richardson

title: Firefox won't load web pages, but problem gets temporarily fixed when I quit the application
content: Firefox has become my new favorite web browser of choice. I recently started having a problem, however. After I have been using firefox for a period of time, it stops loading webpages for me. I will search something or type a website into the search bar but nothing will happen. I know my internet is working because other browsers work just fine. The interesting thing is that when I close out of firefox and quit the application on my mac and reopen, the problem is resolved for a short period of time then it will start happening again. Any tips of what to do?
creator: lvjnglng
